cgcloud__View__c.name: cgcloud__View__c
cgcloud__View__c.description: This object stores the filter criteria for the trade calendar.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Indicates whether the record is activated.

cgcloud__Current_View__c.description: Indicates the current view for the user.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Promotion_Template__c.description: Reference to the Promotion Template for which the current view is used. This attribute is used only for promotion views.

cgcloud__User__c.description: Reference to the user to which the view belongs.

cgcloud__View_Definition__c.description: Contains the .json file of the View record.
